basics.name: Thanh Ly
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science:Security Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2024.

work.summary: Intern at HII-Mission Technologies in the workforce development program
highlights: Work alongside subject matter experts from multiple disciplines across the program
Utilize technical and inter-personal skills and knowledge to support ongoing projects
Participate in briefs, meetings, and educational courses

work.summary: Assist with the daily operations of OVSS
highlights: Assist patrons on any questions about VA education & health benefits
Assist in OVSS outreach at campus center
Assist OVSS director in community project
Attend Leadership Summit with Student Veterans of America

work.summary: Responsible for performing a range of complex assembly procedures for the integration of precision electronics, avionics, and military systems.
highlights: Read and interpret complex blueprints, diagrams, and schematics to ensure correct assembly sequences
Collaborated closely with multidisciplinary engineers on two six-sigma projects
Work closely with Production Supervisors and Engineers to ensure products meet quality assurance and clients standards
Assembled critical components for global defense platforms

work.summary: Operated and managed logistics and maintenance systems across multiple locations
highlights: Operated defense management information system to generate maintenance work orders and to close and open requisitions
Provided technical guidance to lower and higher grade personnel
Interim President, Student Veterans of America, 2022-Present
